ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:0.5_0: The training rule on taking leave of an available monk
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.2_0: At that time a number of nuns were traveling through the Kosalan country on their way to Sāvatthī, when one evening they arrived at a certain village. There they approached a brahmin family and asked for a place to stay.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.4_0: “Please wait, Venerables, until my husband returns.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.6_0: While they were waiting, the nuns put out bedding, and some sat down on it while others lay down.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.7_0: When the husband returned at night, he said to his wife,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.10_0: “Throw out these shaven-headed sluts!”, and he had them thrown out of the house.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.11_0: When they arrived at Sāvatthī they told the nuns there what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.12_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.13_0: “How can nuns approach families at the wrong time, put out bedding without asking permission of the owners, and then sit down and lie down on it?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.14_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.17_0: “... How can nuns act like this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.18_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.19_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:1.20.1_0: ‘If a nun approaches families at the wrong time, puts out bedding without asking permission of the owners, or has it put out, and then sits down or lies down on it, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1.8_0: there are four kinds of family: the aristocratic family, the brahmin family, the merchant family, the worker family.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1.10_0: then you went to there and walk there.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1.12_0: While that family is given to a human being, he won’t enter that family without asking permission.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1.20_0: if she sits down on that seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.1.22_0: if she lies down on that seat, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.2.1_0: If she has not asked permission, and she does not perceive that she has, and she sits down or lies down on bedding after putting it out or having it put out, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.2.2_0: If she has not asked permission, but she is unsure of it, and she sits down or lies down on bedding after putting it out or having it put out, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.2.3_0: If she has not asked permission, but she perceives that she has, and she sits down or lies down on bedding after putting it out or having it put out, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.2.4_0: If she has taken leave, but she does not perceive that she has, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.2.5_0: If she has taken leave, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.2.6_0: If she has taken leave, and she perceives that she has, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.3.2_0: if she first asks permission, and then, after putting out bedding or having it put out, sits down or lies down on it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.3.4_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.3.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc17:2.3.7_0: The seventh rule, the training rule on married girls, is finished.
